Title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
Overview: When the devil resurfaces with aims to take over the world in human form, Johnny Blaze reluctantly comes out of hiding to transform into the flame-spewing supernatural hero Ghost Rider -- and rescue a 10-year-old boy from an unsavory end.
Keywords: monk, eastern europe, skeleton, biker, marvel comic, superhero, motorcycle, devil, dark hero, ghost rider
production_companies: Columbia Pictures, Imagenation Abu Dhabi FZ, Marvel Entertainment, Marvel Knights, Hyde Park Entertainment, Crystal Sky Pictures, Michael De Luca Productions
Cast: Nicolas Cage, Ciarán Hinds, Violante Placido
